user.title: Aviation Weather Setup
user.description: Configure your aviation weather sensors. Enter one or more ICAO airport codes (comma-separated for multiple airports). Weather data is fetched once during setup, then updated using the av_weather.update_weather service call.

data_description.icao_codes: Enter 4-letter ICAO airport codes, comma-separated (e.g., NZAA, KLAX, EGLL)
data_description.feeds: Choose which weather reports to fetch (METAR for current conditions, TAF for forecasts)

abort.already_configured: This set of airports is already configured

init.title: Aviation Weather Settings
init.description: Update weather data settings. Use the av_weather.update_weather service to manually fetch new data. To change which airports you monitor, please remove this integration and add a new one.

data_description.feeds: Choose which weather reports to fetch (METAR for current conditions, TAF for forecasts)
